responseText: NSLOCTEXT("", "24639B52457234757069AEAF9369BC85", "As a raven massacre and quarrantine overtook the kingdom of Aela, a society of Plague Doctors would devote their time to the eradication of the infected and search for an antidote. This society was the reclusive Kyronic Order of Puritans. By order of King Gallus Lyneth, they gave no quarter to the infected, instantly slaying man, woman and child then burning the bodies in pyres. For their own protection the Kyronic Order of Puritans crafted a potion dubbed the Puritan Potion. With this (Damaged Page)")
name: MIDD_0016_TPP_Book_PlagueHistory_12
